title: Paper
description: Explore how to create stylish and customizable papers.

meta.title: LNGRZUI | Paper Documentation
meta.description: Explore how to create stylish and customizable papers.
meta.keywords: component library, reusable components, documentation, application development, UI toolkit

content.overview-desc: The Paper component is a versatile container that can be used to display various types of content in a structured and visually appealing manner. This page explains the different features and customization options available for the Paper component, allowing developers to create stylish and functional papers for their projects.
content.how-to-desc: To use the Paper component, simply import it into your project and place the desired content within the Paper tags. You can customize the appearance and layout of the Paper using the available props such as color, size, and content alignment. Refer to the documentation for detailed usage instructions and examples.
